tool_description: Generates various types of random strings including cryptographically strong strings.
name: Random Strings
title: Random Strings

api_list.name: UUID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-strings.p.rapidapi.com/v1/uuid"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-strings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-strings.p.rapidapi.com/v1/uuid"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-strings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random String
api_list.description: This endpoint generates a random string.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Can be alphabetic, alphanumeric, hex, or base64.

optional_parameters.name: length
optional_parameters.description: Can be any number between 1 and 100.

api_list.name: Random Words
api_list.description: Generates a sentence of random words.

optional_parameters.name: words
optional_parameters.description: Can be any number between 1 and 20.
